highlights.title: Albania
highlights.description: With more than 90% of its power from hydro, Albania is looking to become a Balkan solar powerhouse.

highlights.title: Leaning on coal despite abundant renewable resources.
highlights.description: Though coal is king, Mongolia is blessed with an abundance of natural resources that could make it a renewables powerhouse.

highlights.title: Using a ‘hybrid’ model to boost green hydrogen production and move closer to energy self-sufficiency
highlights.description: Increase in Solar PV uptake moves region closer to energy self-sufficiency

highlights.title: Following an Orderly Transition to build a greener grid and become a regional strong force in hydrogen production
Leading East Africa’s low-carbon energy transition
highlights.description: Already generating 99% renewable electricity thanks to hydro.
